dublin_core.dcvalue: Caitlin Burton, Business Development Manager, Grameen Foundation, Email: cburton@grameenfoundation.org | Karen Romano, Ghana Country Director, Grameen Foundation, Email: kromano@grameenfoundation.org

No-Yawa is a national forum for youth to discuss sexual and reproductive health issues through a toll-free hotline and mobile behavior change content. The system sends educational SMS and voice messages and story messages to youth in six local languages.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:03Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 no-yawa.pdf: 238573 bytes, checksum: 65b650fb0d37124f24cc8b298fe4784e (MD5)

Client education and behavior change communication, Sexual and Reproductive Health
